repairedDockerfile:
FROM golang:1.11

ENV GOPATH=/opt/go:$GOPATH \
    PATH=/opt/go/bin:$PATH

# snag delve and dep
RUN go get github.com/derekparker/delve/cmd/dlv && \
    curl -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/golang/dep/master/install.sh | sh


WORKDIR /opt/go/src/local/myorg/myapp

CMD ["bash"]
